name: 2D Shooter Final Project (Birchbeek)
description:
My final adjustments

  • Redesigned level one, and two. Added additional level as well for 3 in total
  • Added instructions to the instructions menu
  • Added a hitbox to the chaser enemies so they couldn't go through my meteor walls. Also added the ability to destroy a couple of the meteors in level 3. The destroyable meteors are a darker gray color than the rest of them.

Credits:

Created by: Bradey Haulenbeek
